Name: Psywave
Effect: Roll Psychic-Type Damage Dice according to the User's Rank: Starter/1 Die; Rookie/2 Dice; Standard/4 Dice; Advanced/6 Dice; Expert/8 Dice; Ace or higher/10 Dice. Ignore Defenses.
Description: A powerful mental wave assault’s the target’s brain directly. Everything, from forgotten memories to the secrets of the universe bombard its mind in just a few seconds.
